item.title: Jenkins 2.282
item.description:
• Major Bug: Update Eclipse Jetty from 9.4.35.v20201120 to 9.4.38.v20210224 for bug fixes and enhancements.
  • Major RFE: SSHD module is no longer bundled in Jenkins core. Provide SSHD as a plugin.
  • RFE: Do not force plugin upgrades of recently detached plugins.
  • RFE: Upgrade from Remoting 4.6 to Remoting 4.7 with bugfixes and dependency updates.
  • RFE: Remove the hardcoded JKS key store so that other key stores can be used, like BCFKS from the FIPS version of Bouncy Castle.
  • Bug: Improve reconnection behavior for inbound TCP agents.
  • Bug: Internal: Ensure that Jenkins#setViews() updates the configuration only when all views are successfully set.

item.title: Jenkins 2.281
item.description:
• RFE: Improve button focus states.
  • RFE: Remove some workarounds for IE < 11.
  • Major Bug: Developer: Revert symbol-annotation bump (regression in 2.280).
  • RFE: Developer: Relax ParameterDefinition and subclass constructor signatures to allow optional attributes like description to be defined in setters.

item.title: Jenkins 2.280
item.description:
• Security: Important security fix.
  • Major Bug: Fix plugin search over multiple update sites (regression in 2.270).
  • Bug: Show available plugin updates by reloading update center data on upgrade/downgrade.
  • RFE: Update JNA from 5.6.0 to 5.7.0.
  • RFE: Provide new translations for Polish language.

item.title: Jenkins 2.279
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix Internet Explorer 11 rendering of the Available plugins tab (regression in 2.270).
  • Major Bug: Include 'plugin-id' and 'plugin-version' data attributes in the Available plugins tab (regression in 2.270).
  • RFE: Upgrade LDAP plugin from 1.26 minimum to 2.3.

item.title: Jenkins 2.278
item.description:
• RFE: Use an updated version of the Commons FileUpload library 1.4 without custom patches.
  • RFE: Library dependency updates: reflections, javassist, annotation-indexer, commons-compress, bridge-method-annotation, bridge-method-injector, access-modifier-annotation, jaxen.
  • Bug: Restore, as deprecated, the old constructor based on acegisecurity Authentication parameter in order to keep backward compatibility.

item.title: Jenkins 2.277
item.description:
• RFE: Use a more accessible color palette in configuration form tabs.
  • RFE: Improve fingerprint save performance.
  • Bug: Fix drag & drop for form changes (regression in 2.264).
  • Bug: Fix server-side form validation that broke client-side form validation (regression in 2.270).

item.title: Jenkins 2.276
item.description:
• Security: Security fix.
  • Major Bug: Provide a default implementation of the "all files in zip" download link. This is especially important for external storage plugin (regression in 2.275).
  • Major Bug: Fix the file handle leak inside DirectoryBrowserSupport (regression in 2.275).
  • Major Bug: Include root folder in downloaded zip files (regression in 2.275). Resolve an additional related zip archive root folder issue.
  • RFE: Allow job descriptions to be copied without zero-width spaces.
  • RFE: Update spring-security from 5.4.1 to 5.4.2.
  • RFE: Update commons-codec from 1.14 to 1.15.
  • RFE: Add a system property jenkins.agent.inboundUrl to provide an alternate URL for inbound TCP agents.
  • Bug: Restricted methods FilePath#zip(OutputStream, DirScanner, String, boolean) and VirtualFile#zip(OutputStream, String, String, boolean, boolean) have a new parameter String prefix.

item.title: Jenkins 2.275
item.description:
• Security: Important security fixes.
  • RFE: Security hardening related to XML processing using Digester2.
  • RFE: Security hardening related to form validation responses.
  • RFE: Security hardening restricting label names.

item.title: Jenkins 2.274
item.description:
• RFE: Reduce lock contention around jenkins queue.
  • Bug: Prevent user input of 'e' or 'E' as 'positive-number', 'non-negative-number', or 'number'.
  • RFE: Update jnr-posix library from 3.0.45 to 3.1.4.
  • RFE: Update Java native access (jna) library from 5.3.1 to 5.6.0 for most recent platform library fixes and enhancements.

item.title: Jenkins 2.273
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix plugin manager buttons to correctly reposition themselves instead of being stuck under certain conditions (regression in 2.270).
  • RFE: Make the root source paths of GroovyHookScript customizable with jenkins.util.groovy.GroovyHookScript.ROOT_PATH.
  • RFE: Hide collapse icon in sidepanel widgets if they cannot be collapsed.
  • RFE: Update stapler to 1.262 to fix a number of IllegalReflectiveAccessWarnings when running on Java 11.

item.title: Jenkins 2.272
item.description:
• Major Bug: Prevent NullPointerException in Plugin Manager when using an update center without support for plugin categories (regression in 2.270).
  • Bug: Fix race condition on authentication filters registration.
  • RFE: Dropped support for deprecated system properties: hudson.model.Hudson.logStartupPerformance, hudson.model.Hudson.initLogLevel, hudson.model.Hudson.parallelLoad, hudson.model.Hudson.killAfterLoad and hudson.model.Hudson.workspaceDirName. Please use jenkins.model.Jenkins.-prefixed SystemProperties.
  • RFE: Remove support for queue.txt format (replaced by XML in 2009).
  • RFE: Update Eclipse Jetty from 9.4.33.v20201020 to 9.4.35.v20201120 for bug fixes and enhancements.
  • RFE: Remove administrative monitor offering to migrate $JENKINS_HOME on a ZFS filesystem.
  • RFE: Update the bundled XStream library from 1.4.14 to 1.4.15.

item.title: Jenkins 2.271
item.description:
• RFE: Stop bundling CVS plugin. Jenkins will no longer automatically install CVS plugin on startup if a plugin depending on Jenkins (then Hudson) 1.340 or earlier is discovered. If you use a plugin that relies on the functionality provided by CVS plugin and manage plugins outside the Jenkins plugin manager, you will now need to ensure yourself that a recent release of CVS plugin is installed. Jenkins will attempt to load such plugins but may fail at any time during startup or afterwards with ClassNotFoundException or similar.
  • Bug: Don't tell users to signup if they can't.
  • Bug: Correct Freestyle font-size for descriptions.
  • Bug: FieldUtils now silently fails to set public final fields again.
  • RFE: The page variable divBasedFormLayout is globally available, not only within .
  • RFE: Remove unused jquery dependencies.

item.title: Jenkins 2.270
item.description:
• Major RFE: Massive performance enhancement to available plugins page of Plugin Manager. Exact matches of plugin name are moved to the top.
  • Bug: Fix incorrect striping of rows on available page of Plugin Manager.
  • Bug: Ensure that help text expands correctly for GitHub organization folders (regression in 2.264).
  • Bug: Replace slave with agent in Brazilian and Turkish localization of Agent to Controller security.
  • RFE: Add Traditional Chinese translation for description of built-in environment variables that are available to shell scripts.
  • RFE: Use correct unicode in Spanish translation and other fixes.
  • RFE: Developer: Update localizer plugin to allow threaded builds and localization from XML as well as properties.

item.title: Jenkins 2.269
item.description:
• Bug: Populate select fields with default values even when pre-populated select tags are used (regression in 2.244).
  • RFE: Reduce page load time by loading the administrative monitors popup on demand. Allow keyboard navigation even when there are active administrative monitors.
  • RFE: Improve pipeline startup performance with faster comparison method. Add equals and hashCode to ParameterDefinition implementations. Equals works strictly for the same classes to preventing issues with extended classes.
  • RFE: Remove an unused FileSystemProvisioner framework.
  • RFE: Developer: Update Node.js version to latest LTS (14.15.1).
  • RFE: Internal: iconset library inlined into Jenkins core, developers using this should remove the dependency.
  • RFE: Internal: Remove JOnAS application server support.

item.title: Jenkins 2.268
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix drag and drop with environment filter (regression in 2.264).
  • RFE: Update the bundled XStream library from 1.4.13 to 1.4.14.

item.title: Jenkins 2.267
item.description:
• RFE: Add the ability to specify a reason for quieting down Jenkins ("Prepare for shutdown").
  • RFE: Show security and non-security notifications in separate categories with their associated icons.

item.title: Jenkins 2.266
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix hidden page elements from radio blocks appearing when they should not.
  • Bug: Upgrade from Remoting 4.5 to Remoting 4.6 with bugfixes and dependency updates.
  • RFE: Make the Maven Configuration of Global Tools compatible with configuration as code plugin.
  • RFE: Minor English cleanup for resource root URL setting.
  • Major RFE: Developer: Jenkins now uses an updated version of the XStream serialization library without custom patches.
  • Major RFE: Developer: Jenkins now uses Spring Security rather than its predecessor, Acegi Security. Other bundled Spring libraries are also updated.
  • Major RFE: Developer: Upgrade jQuery from 2.1.4 to 3.5.1.
  • RFE: Developer: Remove the deprecated zeroclipboard UI component and the unused dependency on ZeroClipboard.
  • RFE: Developer: Remove obsolete support for live class reloading with JRebel.
  • RFE: Internal: Modernize the hashing function of ConsistentHash.

item.title: Jenkins 2.265
item.description:
• RFE: Improve performance of authorisation strategies when the authentication realm is case insensitive.
  • RFE: French translation for the token paragraph in user configuration and the root breadcrumb ("Dashboard").
  • Bug: Fix file handle leak when viewing corrupted build logs.
  • Bug: Fix redirects when renaming jobs with spaces or non-latin characters.
  • RFE: Developer: Deprecate UnbufferedBase64InputStream.
  • RFE: Developer: Added better parsing overloads to XMLUtils.
  • RFE: Internal: Remove inline resources for LoadStatistics.
  • Bug: Internal: Correct the scope of the restriction on TokenUuidAndPlainValue.

item.title: Jenkins 2.264
item.description:
• Major RFE: Change Jenkins configuration UI from tables to divs for layout in forms.
  • RFE: Winstone 5.12: Update Jetty from 9.4.30.v20200611 to 9.4.33.v20201020.
  • Bug: Cleanup "esclave" references and fix terminology for jobs in the French localization.
  • Bug: Change the standard URL for obtaining the Inbound Agent configuration file from ${agent_url}/slave-agent.jnlp to ${agent_url}/jenkins-agent.jnlp. The old name is obsolete and will be removed at a future time.
  • Bug: Prevent the Build History Widget from crashing when users have Discover permissions without Read for folders.

item.title: Jenkins 2.263
item.description:
• Major Bug: Downgrade Jetty to 9.4.30.v20200611 to prevent a wrong port from appearing in URLs (regression in 2.261).
  • RFE: Remove TFS Plugin suggestion from Setup Wizard.
  • RFE: Optimize memory allocations in TcpAgentListener, LogRotator and RunList.
  • RFE: Add missing French localization for the login page, setup wizard and the main page.
  • RFE: Clarify the list separator in file excludes fields.
  • Bug: Do not use null value for aria-hidden HTML attributes.
  • Bug: Prevent resource leak in the File Fingerprint Storage implementation.

item.title: Jenkins 2.262
item.description:
• Major Bug: Stop showing JavaScript in the footer (regression in 2.261).
  • Major Bug: Restore reporting of ClassNotFoundException stacktraces in AntClassLoader and ClassicPluginStrategy due to the regressions for some agent types (regression in 2.261).
  • RFE: Developer: Update ArtifactArchiver to no longer consult with environment variables injected by EnvironmentContributingAction added during the build, including ArtifactManager ones.

item.title: Jenkins 2.261
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix docker build agent provisioning (regression in 2.259-260).
  • Major Bug: Fix extensions footer location (regression in 2.230).
  • RFE: Introduce LowResourceMonitor from Jetty by upgrading to Winstone 5.11. Bump jetty.version from 9.4.30.v20200611 to 9.4.32.v20200930.
  • Major RFE: SSHD module 2.7: Remove deprecated key exchange and MAC algorithms.
  • RFE: SSHD module 2.7: Allow configuring disabled key exchange and MAC algorithms through system properties.
  • RFE: Reduce memory consumption when loading classes from plugins.
  • RFE: Do not render parts of a serialized ConsoleNote in truncated log output.
  • Bug: Replace "slave" reference with "agent" in Traditional Chinese translation.
  • Bug: Use 'Agent to controller' to describe agent access control system rather than 'agent to master'.
  • Bug: Hide description panel in sidebar if historyWidget.descriptionLimit is 0.
  • RFE: Developer: Pluggable Artifact Storage: Make the VirtualFile API generally available to plugin developers.
  • RFE: Developer: Allow omitting ClassNotFoundException in AntClassLoader and ClassicPluginStrategy.
  • RFE: Internal: Update slf4j-api from 1.7.26 to 1.7.30.
  • RFE: Internal: Update parent pom. Updates various maven plugins and developer tools.

item.title: Jenkins 2.260
item.description:
• Major Bug: Fix docker build agent provisioning (regression in 2.259).
  • RFE: Improve the scripting capacity related to the API Token system. Provide a way to configure a fixed/default API Token for admin during installation phase.
  • RFE: Allow users with the Jenkins.MANAGE permission to restart and safe restart Jenkins.
  • RFE: Disable autocomplete of username on login form.
  • RFE: Internal: Update bundled version of Apache Ant from 1.10.8 to 1.10.9.

item.title: Jenkins 2.259
item.description:
• Major Bug: Show display names in change list again (regression in 2.243).
  • RFE: Update the bundled version of Script Security Plugin from 1.73 to 1.75.
  • RFE: Update the bundled version of Display URL API plugin from 2.0 to 2.3.1.
  • RFE: Developer: Cloud implementations are given more context about ongoing planned nodes. Add CloudState to be passed to Cloud#provision and Cloud#canProvision methods.
  • RFE: Developer: Provide WebAppMain#getDefaultRingBufferSize method for use by telemetry.
  • RFE: Developer: Improve the combobox component to support default value and readonly mode.

item.title: Jenkins 2.258
item.description:
• Major Bug: Migrate the view status filter from views in previous Jenkins releases (regression in 2.240).
  • RFE: Improve the layout and clarity of the page displayed when jobs are not yet created.
  • RFE: Update the bundled Mailer plugin from 1.21 to 1.32.1.
  • Bug: Prevent radio buttons from moving when they are clicked.
  • RFE: Developer: A SimpleBuildStep or SimpleBuildWrapper can now choose not to require a workspace context (working directory and launcher).
  • RFE: Developer: PluginServletFilter is now final, making it impossible for plugins to mistakenly define their own.

item.title: Jenkins 2.257
item.description:
• RFE: Name the first breadcrumb "Dashboard" for clarity.
  • Bug: Make sure Environments are always torn down in AbstractBuild.
  • RFE: Developer: New static utility method Result#combine(Result,Result) to get the worst of two (nullable) build results.

item.title: Jenkins 2.256
item.description: • Bug: Avoid warning on logs about Anonymous Class in hudson.FilePath.

item.title: Jenkins 2.255
item.description: • Bug: Developer: Ignore flaky UpdateCenter2Test.install test.

item.title: Jenkins 2.254
item.description:
• Major Bug: Stop pre-formatting agent logs to prevent deadlocks (regression in 2.231).
  • Major RFE: Graduate Overall/SystemRead permission to general availability (GA) status.
  • RFE: Set Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy to same-origin.
  • RFE: Avoid losing work in progress by using a new browser tab to open the plugin link in a configuration screenâ€™s inline help.
  • RFE: Developer: Remove the unused description attribute from f:dropdownList.

item.title: Jenkins 2.253
item.description:
• Major RFE: Major update of the Alpine-based Jenkins Docker image. Jenkins Docker image for Alpine now uses Alpine 3.12 and AdoptOpenJDK 8u262.
  • Major Bug: Fix button that copies API token to clipboard (regression in 2.238).
  • Major Bug: Fix a deadlock in agent logging.
  • Bug: Fix Cmd + Enter not running the script in the Script Console on a Mac (regression in 2.248).
  • Bug: Fix backspace key sometimes did not delete text from the Script Console on a Mac (regression in 2.248).
  • Bug: Fix regular expression validator UI location (regression in 2.244).
  • Bug: Make alert colors consistent with 'Manage Jenkins' alert colors.
  • RFE: Add Japanese translations for user configuration screen.
  • RFE: Prevent concurrent build deletion.
  • Bug: Developer: Make unavailable plugin background themeable.
  • RFE: Developer: Expose fingerprint range set serialization methods for plugins.
  • Bug: Internal: Remove some text messages from Jenkins core which had already been moved to the LDAP and PAM Authentication plugins. Be sure to upgrade to LDAP 1.22 or newer and PAM Authentication 1.5 or newer.
  • RFE: Internal: Remove deprecated and unused ProcessTreeKiller class.
  • RFE: Internal: Exclude JUnit and Hamcrest libraries from the jenkins.war bundle.
